nodes.text: Boulad was a male Cragmoloid who worked as a slicer and information broker. During his hunt for the killer of Senator Padmé Amidala, Captain Typho paid Boulad five thousand credits for information regarding the whereabouts of any Sith at a specific time and planet. He learned that Darth Sidious went to Mustafar the same time Amidala and Anakin Skywalker were there.
